name: Robots vs Aliens (Hdogcoder)
description:
Description

Robots vs Aliens is a 2D top down shooter where the goal is to prevent the aliens from taking over Earth from the robots who have previously taken over after the human race went extinct

PS: the score on the top right doesn't reset. I'll fix that by the end of this week

The controls are very simple :

WASD or Arrow keys - To move

Left mouse button to shoot

I spent 1 1/2 weeks producing this game and I hope you enjoy this experience
